attributes.additional_details:
Brother Moazzam Begg was arrested on Tuesday 25th February alongside 4 others in a raid that took place in the West Midlands

Brother Moazzam had been illegally detained in Guantanamo where he was subjected to and witnessed the most horrific ordeal at the hands of the US

As part of 'cageprisoners' who are actively helping to raise awareness of brothers and sisters that are illegally detained under false terrorism charges with no proof - it is no shock that our brother has a passion for humanitarian causes.

He has been accused of instigating terrorism following his trip back from Syria as an aid worker.

We would like the proof and grounds of his arrest made known to the public and answers to why he had been targeting again.
